name: contentful-batch-migrator
description: A robust solution for migrating large Contentful spaces without hitting rate limits

scripts.help:
echo '
ðŸ“š Available Commands:
  npm run split          - Split export into batches
  npm run import         - Import all batches
  npm run validate       - Validate migration
  npm run resume         - Resume failed import
  npm run cleanup-drafts - Remove orphan and invalid drafts
  npm run clean          - Remove batches directory
  npm run clean:all      - Remove batches and export
'

author: Faisal Basra <faisal.basra@gmail.com>
